name: Jingkai He
title: Effective Observability on Kubernetes Using Grafana Alloy
abstract:
Achieving comprehensive observability in Kubernetes environments can be costly and challenging. This talk will deep dive into implementing production-grade observability pipeline on Kubernetes platform using Grafana Alloy, and demonstrate how to collect metrics, logs, traces and profiles in a cohesive and cost-effective manner.

This talk will cover:
* Understanding Grafana Alloy architecture and advantages over traditional stacks.
* How to roll out Grafana to your production Kubernetes cluster.
* Best practice on collecting and using metrics, logs, traces and profiles on Grafana.
bio: Jingkai He is an independent software consultant based in London.
